page.title: 02The Parish Church
page.content: The present Parish Church of{St.John {the Baptist}was started about 1345 and finished by the end of the century.The Black Death interrupted building for several years.There have been no major additions since then.The main part of the church is built of gritstone and the roof is covered with lead.Some windows are made of stained glass.They show biblical scenes.There is a hexagonal,carved,gritstone pulpit. There are several interesting old tombs. Sir Samson Meveril (died 1462) rests in a marble table tomb in the chancel.There are four other tombs,one of which belongs to{Bishop Robert {Pursglove}(died 1579).He founded Tideswell Grammar School.This eventually closed about 1932,but the present primary school is named after him. .
